item.title: Supreme Court Upholds The Individual Mandate
item.description: Supreme Court Health Care Decision: Individual Mandate Survives http://t.co/sXBCxFFd via @HuffPostPol
item.content:encoded: Supreme Court Health Care Decision: Individual Mandate Survives http://t.co/sXBCxFFd via @HuffPostPol WASHINGTON -- The individual health insurance mandate is constitutional, the Supreme Court ruled Thursday, upholding the central provision of President Barack Obama's signature Affordable Care Act. The controlling opinion, written by Chief Justice John Roberts, upheld the mandate as a tax, although concluded it was not valid as an exercise of Congress' commerce clause power. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com
